import { Component } from '@angular/core'; @Component({ selector: 'app-menu', templateUrl: './menu.component.html', styleUrls: ['./menu.component.scss'] }) export class MenuComponent { isNavbarCollapsed = false; constructor() { } toggleNavbar() { this.isNavbarCollapsed = !this.isNavbarCollapsed; } }
